DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Asia. The aim of this trial is to investigate the efficacy and safety of biphasic insulin aspart 30 as start insulin in subjects with type 2 diabetes failing OAD therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Biphasic Insulin Aspart 30 in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
Insulin aspart, insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes for at least 24 months BMI between 18 and 30 kg/m2 Insulin naive subjects OAD treatment with max two OADs alone or combined with other therapy HbA1c between 712% Type 1 diabetes Receipt of any investigational drug within the last three months prior to this trial Current or previous treatment with thiazolidiones within the last 6 months OAD treatment with three or more OADs within the last 4 months
